results.name: Alternating sum of all divisors of n; divisors nonincreasing, starting with n.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: Equals A054525 * A134871; i.e., Mobius transform of [1, 2, 3, 5, 5, 8, 7, 10, 10, 12, 11, ...]. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Nov 14 2007
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 18 2002, Jul 03 2008
